detail_desc: Viscose jersey top with a deep neckline at the front and short cap sleeves.
Jumper in a fine-knit cotton blend with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and loops at the top of the shaft. Linings and insoles in soft faux shearling, and chunky soles.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short top in a soft rib knit in a narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps.

prod_name: Khloe high leg high waist bott
detail_desc: Brazilian briefs in cotton jersey with a high waist, lined gusset, high-cut legs and half-string back.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Hat in soft, rib-knit cashmere with a turned-up hem.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a soft brushed finish. Collar, buttons down the front, two chest pockets, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in a sturdy rib knit with a stand-up collar and zip at the top.
Short-sleeved jersey top with a motif.
Cropped top in a soft, fine knit containing some wool. Wide shoulder straps reinforced with grosgrain, and a wide, ribbed hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Jersey jumpsuit in a patterned cotton blend with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front and side pockets. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and long legs with ribbed hems.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neck and straight-cut hem.
Bomber jacket in mesh with reversible sequins.Ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a motif at the top. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.

Knee-length coat in woven fabric with notch lapels, a detachable belt with a round metal buckle at the waist and no fasteners. Adjustable tab and press-studs at the cuffs and discreet pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Dress in soft, printed cotton chambray with a collar, buttons at the top and long sleeves with a tab and button. Seam with a tie detail at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.
Short jacket in patterned faux fur with a collar, concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front, pockets in the side seams and gently gathered elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Leotard in patterned, glossy jersey with decorative gathers at the top, crossover straps at the back and 3/4-length sleeves.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with terry inside.
Fleece-lined jacket in a patterned weave with a stand-up collar, detachable hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Elastication around the hood, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Dressing gown in soft, textured pile with notch lapels and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, button fly and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with lace details, a low waist and lined gusset.
Fully lined bikini top with laser-cut scalloped edges. Underwired, moulded, padded cups that lift and shape, ties at the back of the neck and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.

Short, off-the-shoulder top in crinkled jersey with smocking at the top and hem, and long balloon sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Elasticated fabric scrunchies.
Leggings in soft jersey with a wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy. The cotton content of the leggings is organic.
Tube scarf in a soft, textured-knit viscose blend with ribbed edges. Length 25 cm, circumference 54 cm.
Short, sleeveless romper suit in a fine-knit linen and cotton blend with shoulder straps, a double row of flounces at the top, buttons at the back and elasticated hems.
Short, wide dress in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and press-studs at the top. Dropped shoulders, short wide sleeves and large patch front pockets.
Shirt in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Vest tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline and armholes.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed viscose jersey with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
Loafers in imitation patent leather with chunky, patterned soles. Linings and insoles in a cotton weave.
V-neck blouse in an airy, textured cotton weave with buttons down the front, 3/4-length puff sleeves with narrow cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Chunky soles that are patterned underneath for a good grip. Heel 3.5 cm.
Sleeveless dress in tulle with a sequined satin bodice with an outer mesh layer, and a seam at the waist with a glittery elastic waistband and a skirt in several layers of tulle. Lined.

Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a V-shaped opening at the back and wide ties at the back of the neck. Dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves that taper at the cuffs. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Set with a hat and pair of mittens in a jacquard knit. Fleece-lined hat with a pompom on top, earflaps and ties under the chin. Mittens with foldover ribbing at the top and a fleece lining. Sizes 0-6M without thumbs.
Cropped T-shirt in jersey with a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Wide top in soft, crêped viscose jersey with short cap sleeves and a gently rounded hem.
Super-wide culottes in a cupro weave with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Inset panels down the legs for added width.

Small nylon bag with reinforced edges, a zipped outer compartment and a narrow shoulder strap with a stylish metal cord stopper. Flap with a hook and loop fastening, a zipped inner compartment and six card compartments, one with a plastic window. Size approx. 12.5x16 cm.
Short, fitted cardigan in a fine knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.

Longer, straight-cut jacket in sturdy cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Chest pockets with a flap and button, patch front pockets and one inner pocket. Unlined. The cotton content of the jacket is partly recycled.

Windbreaker in nylon with a detachable hood, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and long raglan sleeves. Welt front pockets with a press-stud, elasticated cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Shorts in cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details in a slightly looser fit. Regular waist, slightly lower crotch, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Imitation leather trainers with a lightly padded top edge, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front and contrasting colour heel caps. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Treggings in sturdy stretch jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Baby Exclusive. Garter-stitched romper suit knitted in soft organic cotton with buttons at the top, crotch and down the legs. Long raglan sleeves and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Thick socks in a fine-knit wool blend with foldover tops.
Long-sleeved polo shirt in stretch jersey made from a cotton blend with a collar and button placket. Slim Fit.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a fold-down shaft. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim made from a cotton blend with hard-worn details. Regular, adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with sequined embroidery and buttons down the front. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in ribbed jersey with a sheen. The dress has slits in the sides and a raw-edge hem.
Knee-length skirt in washed denim with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, back pockets and diagonal side pockets.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Short, wide dress in an organic cotton weave with a V-neck and a drawstring at the top around the neckline. Buttons that fasten at one side of the neckline, cap sleeves, a vertical drawstring at the top and a seam at the hips. Straight fit at the top, a flared skirt with several layers for extra width, an asymmetric hem and short slits in the sides. Unlined.
Oversized biker jacket in imitation leather with a faux fur collar and lining. Diagonal zip down the front, zipped front pockets and a detachable belt with a metal buckle at the hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with half-length puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless blouse in satin with a draped neckline at the front and a concealed zip at the back of the neck.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.

Blouse in lace with V-shaped, scallop-edged flounces down the front and back and a high collar with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with scalloped edges, and a scalloped hem. The polyamide content of the blouse is recycled.

Shirt in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Non-wired triangle bra in microfibre and lace with moulded cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Wide fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Short shorts that can be worn as a skirt in an airy weave. Covered elastication at the back of the waist, a flounce-trimmed, double-layered front section and a decorative bow at the waist.
Sunglasses with plastic frames, metal sidepieces and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Short, wide top in soft, printed jersey with dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Knee-length dress in lace with a small stand-up collar and concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist, cap sleeves with scalloped edges and a scalloped hem. Lined.
Fitted body in sturdy, ribbed jersey with a sheen. V-neck, decorative, crossover lace straps at the front and press-studs at the crotch.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim, straight legs.
Hat in braided paper straw with a grosgrain band. Width of brim approx. 11 cm.
